attributes.title: The download issue
attributes.review: I don’t know if it’s the WiFi of me but it took so long to download which was a issue for me and would really be nice of you fix that issue and I didn’t really like how this app work this app kept showing us a hot Cheeto and this app asked too many personal questions of that, that’s why I gave it this rate!

attributes.title: This app is useless
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to stay up to date on all things Donald Trump, but I soon realized that this app is a scam, and is only meant as propaganda, as a result I am completely incapable of using it. I also remembered that looking at anything related to Donald trump makes me feel physically ill, which is another major factor in me leaving such a review

attributes.title: the worst app
attributes.review: The most HORRIBLE app to ever download. that disgusting Cheeto was the first thing I saw. almost threw up too. be careful when you open the app. his hideous smile is the first thing you too. I was like🤮🤮🤮. I think I need to go to the hospital my eyes are burninggggggg

attributes.title: Worst president, I mean, app, ever
attributes.review: This app is absolutely awful. Like many others I began experiencing glitches after downloading, as well as an onslaught of notifications, and the app violated my privacy settings by using my location services. This app is dangerous. Not a good app for 2020. Spreads misinformation and violates our rights. If I could give it 0 stars I would.

attributes.title: COMPLETE SCAM
attributes.review: I got this app expecting there to be actual news but all I got was weird internet conspiracy theories with no evidence to back it up. It asked for my information and it’s been searching me in the background. I have a suspicion this app is being used by spies saying it’s a trump app but all i saw was information about some orangutan. I’m so confused???

attributes.title: Doesn’t work
attributes.review: Well the slogan says to keep America great, but that’s clearly not happening. I don’t understand how we’re getting closer and closer to fascism and this app isn’t solving anything. I just don’t understand. My poor America is fighting for her life, and this app has nothing to fix it. I tried to love this app, but this is the best review I could do. 🤷🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: No ❤️
attributes.review: I got this app to see what’s up, but you know what I saw? A picture of this orange cheeto getting another spray tan, and to make it worse he was built like peppa the pig. 💀 I’m sorry but it’s a no from me. ❤️ and Simon too. I see u sis💞✨🥰 i wish i didn’t tho🧚✨💖 now take a seat and make it ✨electric✨I think it’s time to go back to the zoo orangutan. 💅🏻 in an ape habitat where you belong. 😘✨

attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: This is app is awful!!!!!!!! I don’t think I could get past the enter your phone number screen without wanting to throw my phone into the pond in front of me. It is terribly vile and should be gone for good! Simply not downloading is not enough! Just take this app off completely! Was not satisfied at all. Thank you for your time!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review:
when i went on the app i passed out😕i showed it to my pet possum and it DIED AFTER WATCHING THIS😤then when i opened the app again my phone caught on fire🤬 this gave my phone 126 viruses😱 I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP!!!

i’m writing this from the hospital bc after i passed out i kept throwing up non stop, became extremely dehydrated, got 87 test and my kidney failed. don’t download this app😾

attributes.title: Omg 💀🤢
attributes.review: I opened the app just for it to freeze and then show me a fat Cheeto being racist and saying disgusting deplorable things about people of color!! Then it went on to delete all my other apps and kill my family! I absolutely CANNOT recommend just a horrible app that destroys lives and homes 🤢🤢 imagine what it’ll do to the children!
